text: kya ve kahate hain ki aapane ise[1] svayan bana liya hai? aap kah den ki yadi mainne ise svayan bana liya hai, to tum mujhe allaah kee pakad se bachaane ka koee adhikaar nahin rakhate.[2] vahee adhik gyaani hai un baaton ka, jo tum bana rahe ho. vahee paryaapt hai gavaah ke lie mere tatha tumhaare beech aur vah bada kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
